items.sentence: Tom had a near death experience last summer.
Tom is busy making breakfast for the family.
Tom applied for the job, but didn\'t get it.
Why would I be here if I didn\'t want to be?

Tom has been under a lot of strain recently.
Tom has called me many times this past week.
Tom has decided to hire a private detective.
Tom has got nobody to look after him but me.
Do you know the real reason Tom isn\'t here?
Tom is only a couple of years older than me.
Tom is playing by himself in the front yard.
Everyone knows that it was Tom who did that.

French is one of the languages that I speak.
Tom refused to believe that Mary was guilty.
I can\'t believe you thought I was cheating.
I can\'t figure out how to solve the puzzle.
I can\'t get this splinter out of my finger.
I really don\'t understand what\'s so funny.
